Author: landersson
Title: [depreciated]
Body: IT IS FOR FREE   Receive 100 ABT (=0.03 ETH) just for downloading Addap's & joining. There is a limited number of spots in the program, secure your free token today! You can find full information in our Telegram Channel ( https://t.me/abt_addaps ).    If you have any questions I am more than happy to help  / Louise @ ABT & Addap's

Author: csilla
Title: [depreciated]
Body: *** Important Business Announcement ***   ABT Technologies Limited signed an agreement with a major strategic global blockchain partner.  ABT Technologies Limited, Addap’s is a revolutionary blockchain based web browser that allows users to navigate the online world in a smarter and safer environment, including ABT decentralized browsing web services, multi tasking and multi screening web interfaces and the ability to create and share multiple web environments.  ABT Technologies Limited is pleased to announce that it has signed an agreement with a major strategic alliance partnership with one of the fastest growing players in the Blockchain space. This agreement will enable ABT to accelerate the adoption browser as the major blockchain browsing solution in the market, enlarging substantially its eco-system and user reach.    Based on these recent and valuable developments, ABT Technologies Limited has set an ICO launch date to March 30th, 2018. The additionally time will allow ABT to incorporate the developments with the new partnership prior to launching the crowd sale ensuring a higher level of success.  More updates and news worthy press release will follow shortly.     Best regards,    Adi Sossover Co-founder and CEO

Author: findico
Title: [depreciated]
Body: Hi everyone! Just added this incredible ICO to my website   https://findico.io/ico/advanced-browsing-token   Findico.io is a leading cryptocurrency and ICOs portal. Whether you are already involved with ICO or other cryptocurrencies or just want to get into it, Findico.io is a resource to keep updated. ICO rating platform supported by investors and financial experts and users. Findico.io mission is to make it easy for users to find the best ICOs to join. We strive to provide useful and transparent information on ICOs, helping users find projects that have a great potential for success. We also offer a whitelabel platform for ICO projects (Wallet, tokensale system, smart contract, audit and etc) to present themselves to potential users. We have steadily increased the quantity and the quality of information required from ICO projects and we will continue to do so to help this new industry flourish.

Author: turlando
Title: [depreciated]
Body: What kind of protections are in place? Could there not be a situation where a fake user confirms his or her identify with the help of a fake agent?

Author: landersson
Title: [depreciated]
Body: Hi there! I can see you have shared a lot of our posts, perfect! But the requirements include having your number of friends visible, and having at least 150 friends. As for now, all I can see from your profile is that you have 111 followers. Our bounty program manager will send you an email concerning this.  If you have any further questions we are happy to help  / Louise @ Addap's

Author: csilla
Title: [depreciated]
Body: Hi!  The identity confirmation rely on your private key, only available on your trusted devices. Your identity cannot be faked or stolen when using Login and Digital Identity feature of the ABT Protocol.   / Csilla @Addap's

Body: what is the advantage of this browser to BAT brave browser?

Author: landersson
Title: [depreciated]

Author: dfebrero
Title: [depreciated]
Body: Thank you for asking! Addap's browser allows you to create Boards environments composed of may webpages, all simultaneously visible and active in the same tabulation. You can save your environments, share them and re open them at any time on any device. You should definitively have a look at https://www.addaps.com  https://www.addaps.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/appScreen2.png  https://www.addaps.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/s3.png  https://www.addaps.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/appScreen6.png

Author: iamlds08
Title: [depreciated]
Body: thanks for the insight team! i love the multiple tabs idea of addap i think that old school internet interface is in need of development like what your product do. by the way, does addap browser has better security features unlike the present browsers?

Author: csilla
Title: [depreciated]
Body: Hey there,  The security features of Addap's will bring an additional layer of security in comparaison to other browser by allowing the access to the Browser only with your private key - and by storing your Boards and Bookmarks into the Blockchain instead of company servers  /Csilla @Addap´s
